name: Nessos Information Technologies
body:
# Open source projects

* [MBrace](http://nessos.github.io/MBrace) The MBrace framework is an open-source distributed runtime that enables scalable, fault-tolerant computation and data processing for the .NET/mono frameworks. The MBrace programming model uses a distributed continuation-based approach elegantly manifested through computation expressions in F#.

* [FsPickler](http://nessos.github.io/FsPickler) FsPickler is a serialization library that facilitates the distribution of .NET objects. The implementation focuses on performance and completeness in supported types, including F# types. It supports multiple, pluggable serialization formats including Binary, Xml, JSON and BSON. 

* [LinqOptimizer](http://nessos.github.io/LinqOptimizer) An automatic query optimizer for LINQ to Objects and PLINQ. LinqOptimizer compiles declarative LINQ queries into fast loop-based imperative code. The compiled code has fewer virtual calls and heap allocations, better data locality and speedups of up to 15x.

* [UnionArgParser](http://nessos.github.io/UnionArgParser) A declarative CLI argument/XML configuration parser for F#.

* [Vagrant](http://nessos.github.io/Vagrant) A library for distributing dynamic assemblies.
